projectPurpose: To provide a command-line interface for mining the ORE cryptocurrency on the Solana blockchain.
mainFeatures: Connect to mining pools or solo mine
Interact with Solana blockchain for claiming rewards

alternatives.name: Solana CLI
mainFeatures: Deploy and interact with Solana programs

alternatives.name: ore-private-pool-cli
mainFeatures: Client for joining private ORE mining pools
Zero fee charge for computing client

marketPositioning: ore-cli is positioned as the primary command-line interface for ORE cryptocurrency mining on Solana, offering a direct, flexible, and scriptable experience. It serves users comfortable with terminal environments or requiring automation, specializing in the ORE mining protocol compared to the general-purpose Solana CLI, and providing a more controllable alternative to the web interface.
